messages.message:
Hey @sean.donohoe, I created a new crafting sandbox, but the kubeconfig is missing. I ran `workspace setup` again, but it seems like it's not actually configuring the file (like I assume it's supposed to):
```owner@dev:~/instabase$ /usr/local/bin/workspace setup
2024-10-02T17:28:48Z    INFO    Stopping any running daemons
2024-10-02T17:28:48Z    INFO    Disconnecting from any connected Instabase clusters
2024-10-02T17:28:49Z    INFO    Configuring generic environment settings
2024-10-02T17:28:49Z    INFO    Setting up SSL
2024-10-02T17:28:49Z    INFO    Configuring access to GCR
2024-10-02T17:28:50Z    INFO    Configuring access to ECR (549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com))
2024-10-02T17:28:50Z    INFO    Configuring kubeconfig /usr/local/etc/kubeconfig for connected cluster
2024-10-02T17:28:50Z    ERROR   Failed to run base environment setup steps      {"error": "reading kubeconfig: open /usr/local/etc/kubeconfig: no such file or directory"}
github.com/instabase/releng/crafting/workspace/cmd.setupWorkspace (http://github.com/instabase/releng/crafting/workspace/cmd.setupWorkspace)
        releng/crafting/workspace/cmd/setup.go:41
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute (http://github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute)
        external/com_github_spf13_cobra/command.go:944
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC (http://github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC)
        external/com_github_spf13_cobra/command.go:1068
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute (http://github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute)
        external/com_github_spf13_cobra/command.go:992
github.com/instabase/releng/crafting/workspace/cmd.Execute (http://github.com/instabase/releng/crafting/workspace/cmd.Execute)
        releng/crafting/workspace/cmd/root.go:39
main.main
        releng/crafting/workspace/main.go:9
runtime.main
        GOROOT/src/runtime/proc.go:267
2024-10-02T17:28:50Z    INFO    Configuring any detected user environment preferences
2024-10-02T17:28:50Z    WARN    No sandbox-preferences config found in /home/user
2024-10-02T17:28:50Z    INFO    Connecting to Instabase cluster crafting-aihub under namespace intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase
2024-10-02T17:28:55Z    INFO    Ensuring disabled service apps-server is stopped
2024-10-02T17:28:55Z    INFO    Ensuring disabled service webpack is stopped
^[[O2024-10-02T17:28:55Z        INFO    Ensuring disabled service webapp is stopped
2024-10-02T17:28:55Z    INFO    Ensuring disabled service api-server is stopped
2024-10-02T17:28:55Z    INFO    Service apps-server turn down complete!
2024-10-02T17:28:57Z    INFO    Service webapp turn down complete!
2024-10-02T17:28:57Z    INFO    Service api-server turn down complete!
2024-10-02T17:28:57Z    INFO    Service webpack turn down complete!```

Running

```touch /usr/local/etc/kubeconfig```
Fixed this, but I figure this is a bug in workspace setup
Yes this is a bug in the workspace CLI which I just have not had any time to address :disappointed:
